DEFAULT - imagingbook.spectral.dft.ScalingMode
Same scaling factor (1/sqrt(M)) is applied in forward and inverse transform.

Dft1d.Float - Interface in imagingbook.spectral.dft
 
Dft1dDirect - Class in imagingbook.spectral.dft

FourierDescriptor - Class in imagingbook.spectral.fd
This is the abstract super-class for Fourier descriptors.
FourierDescriptor() - Constructor for class imagingbook.spectral.fd.FourierDescriptor
 
FourierDescriptorFromPolygon - Class in imagingbook.spectral.fd
Subclass of FourierDescriptor whose constructors assume that input polygons are non-uniformly sampled.

FourierDescriptorUniform - Class in imagingbook.spectral.fd
Subclass of FourierDescriptor whose constructors assume that input polygons are uniformly sampled.
FourierDescriptorUniform(Pnt2d[]) - Constructor for class imagingbook.spectral.fd.FourierDescriptorUniform
Creates a new Fourier descriptor from a uniformly sampled polygon V with the maximum number of Fourier coefficient pairs.
FourierDescriptorUniform(Pnt2d[], int) - Constructor for class imagingbook.spectral.fd.FourierDescriptorUniform
Creates a new Fourier descriptor from a uniformly sampled polygon V with Mp coefficient pairs.

I

imagingbook.spectral - package imagingbook.spectral
Library code related to spectral image processing (Fourier transforms etc.), separated from the main imagingbook library to minimize third-party dependencies.
imagingbook.spectral.dct - package imagingbook.spectral.dct
 
imagingbook.spectral.dft - package imagingbook.spectral.dft
